title: Rank ion attraction to water - Zn2+ Ca2+ Ba2+

content.prompt: Based on the data in the table above, which of the following correctly predicts the relative strength of the attraction of Zn2+, Ca2+, and Ba2+ ions to water molecules in a solution, from strongest to weakest, and provides the correct reason?

choices.label: Zn2+ > Ca2+ > Ba2+ because the smaller ions have a stronger coulombic attraction to water
Zn2+ > Ca2+ > Ba2+ because the smaller ions are more electronegative
Ba2+ > Ca2+ > Zn2+ because the larger ions are more polarizable
Ba2+ > Ca2+ > Zn2+ because the larger ions are less electronegative
